headline.print_headline: How the Dow Jones Industrial Average Did Thursday
headline.main: How the Dow Jones Industrial Average Did Thursday

lead_paragraph: Major U.S. stock indexes finished mostly higher on Thursday, delivering another record-high close for the Standard & Poor's 500 index. It was the fifth straight gain for S&P 500 on a day when the market mostly drifted between small gains and losses before a slight recovery in the last half hour.
